= Installation =

Download app_notify here. Unpack.

*< asterisk 1.6*

Install it.
{{{ 
make
make install
}}}
*>= asterisk 1.6*

Open app_notify.c in a text editor and add: 
{{{
#include "asterisk.h"
}}}
right below this stanza: 
{{{
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <unistd.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <sys/types.h>
}}}
Install it.
{{{ 
make
make install
}}}
